subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk became an unrestricted free agent again when an arbitrator agreed with the N.H.L. that his contract circumvented the salary cap.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk became an unrestricted free agent again when an arbitrator agreed with the N.H.L. that his contract circumvented the salary cap.
